---
title: "Mask Project Tables"
output: pdf_document
---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
tab <- matrix(c(2,4,3,88,93,42,25,34,26),ncol=3)
colnames(tab) <- c("Floor", "Medical", "Non-Medical")
rownames(tab) <- c("Tues.", "Wed.","Thurs.")
knitr::kable(tab, caption = "Frequency Distribution Table of People in The Library")
```
